pages.name: Yawning of the Void
pages.text: Use a $(l:bloodmagic:rituals/ritual_diviner#dusk)Ritual Diviner [Dusk]$(/l) for easier construction.

To set a filter, place any form of $(item)Item Filter$() into the linked $(item)Chest$(). The ritual will only use the first filter it finds, but will accept $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/item_routing/standard_item_filter)Standard$(), $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/item_routing/tag_item_filter)Tag$(), $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/item_routing/mod_item_filter)Mod$(), and $(l:bloodmagic:demon_will/item_routing/composite_item_filter)Composite Item Filters$(). Blacklisting works too!
